t: What Is Amazon Family? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Family allows you to easily manage all your shared services, subscriptions, and digital content from one place. You can manage profiles or linked accounts to share benefits and control access to services and content for kids and teens. Amazon Family allows you to share Amazon benefits ...

t: the Amazon Household page
s: A Household allows you to connect and share Amazon benefits with the whole family. Two adults and up to four teens and four child profiles may link in a Household · Two adults in a Household can share digital content and if they are Prime members, Prime benefits

t: How to use Amazon Household to share Prime benefits with your whole family
s: March 14, 2023 - You can make the most of your Prime membership by sharing delivery benefits, movies and TV shows, eBooks, and more with up to six people.

t: Create Your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can create an Amazon Family to share Prime benefits and a Family Library with another adult, up to four teens (who were added before April 7, 2025), and up to four children.
